data.funFact: Sharks can detect one drop of blood in 100 liters of water!
data.congrats: You're swimming with success!

data.funFact: Dolphins sleep with one half of their brain at a time!
data.congrats: You're making waves of progress!

data.funFact: Male deer shed and regrow their antlers every year!
data.congrats: You've leaped to success!

data.funFact: Chickens can remember over 100 different faces of people or animals!
data.congrats: You're ruling the roost!

data.funFact: An owl's eyes are not true eyeballs - they're elongated tubes held in place by bones in the skull!
data.congrats: You're as wise as can be!

data.funFact: A rabbit's teeth never stop growing - they wear them down by chewing!

data.funFact: Some species of fish can fly for up to 45 seconds!

data.sorry: There are plenty more fish in the sea - try again!

data.funFact: The smallest dinosaur was the size of a chicken, while the largest was longer than three school buses!
data.congrats: You're roaring with success!
data.sorry: Don't let this answer go extinct - try again!

data.funFact: A dog's sense of smell is up to 100,000 times stronger than humans - they can even smell emotions!
data.congrats: You're pawsitively brilliant!
data.sorry: Every dog has its day - try again!

data.funFact: Cats can make over 100 different vocal sounds, while dogs can only make around 10!
data.congrats: You're the cat's whiskers!
data.sorry: Don't let curiosity get the better of you - try again!

data.funFact: A hedgehog has between 5,000 and 7,000 spines, each of which can last about a year before falling out and being replaced!
data.congrats: You're sharp as a hedgehog's spines!
data.sorry: Don't curl up in defeat - try again!

data.funFact: Snails can sleep for up to three years at a time when the weather is unfavorable!
data.congrats: Slow and steady wins the race!
data.sorry: Don't retreat into your shell - try again!

data.funFact: If a worm is cut in half, the head end can survive and regenerate its tail (but the tail end can't grow a new head)!
data.congrats: You're really digging deep!
data.sorry: Don't squirm away - wiggle back and try again!

data.funFact: Foxes use the Earth's magnetic field to help them hunt - they are more successful when facing north!

data.funFact: Mice sing complex ultrasonic songs to attract mates - we just can't hear them without special equipment!
data.congrats: You're mighty like a mouse!

data.funFact: Bears can smell food from over a mile away!

data.funFact: No two tigers have exactly the same stripe pattern!

data.funFact: A lion's roar can be heard from up to 5 miles away!
data.congrats: You're roaring with success!
data.sorry: Even the king of the jungle has off days!

data.funFact: Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated from them!
data.congrats: That was udderly fantastic!
data.sorry: Don't have a cow, you'll do better next time!

data.funFact: Pigs are one of the most intelligent animals, smarter than dogs and even some primates!
